variable.description: DOES A HEARING PROBLEM MAKES YOU IRRITABLE?

variable.name: E_5
variable.description: DOES A HEARING PROBLEM CAUSE YOU TO FEEL FRUSTRATED WHEN TALKING TO MEMBERS OF YOUR FAMILY?

variable.name: E_7
variable.description: DOES A HEARING PROBLEM CAUSE YOU TO FEEL "STUPID" OR "DUMB"?

variable.name: E_9
variable.description: DO YOU FEEL HANDICAPPED BY A HEARING PROBLEM?
